articles.author: Jack Maloney
articles.title: Pacers vs. Thunder score: Indiana forces first NBA Finals Game 7 in nine years with blowout victory - CBS Sports
articles.description: The Pacers dominated OKC to force a winner-take-all Game 7
articles.content: In the immortal words of Zaza Pachulia, "we're going to Game 7, baby!" The Indiana Pacers dominated Game 6 of the 2025 NBA Finals on Thursday, leading by as many as 31 points en route to a 108-91 win… [+6672 chars]
